DataElement.preferredName: Patient Caregiver Encounter Discharge Date java.util.Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.:Each individual, unique interaction between two subjects of interest._The release of a patient from a course of care.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._Generic value domain for a java datatype that represents a specific instant in time, with millisecond precision.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.
Each individual, unique interaction between two subjects of interest.

The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a java datatype that represents a specific instant in time, with millisecond precision.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
